<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%gd_id() File ID Unique ID for the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%gd_md5() MD5 MD5 checksum of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%gd_mimetype() Mime Type Type of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%gd_time() File Time The last time the file was modified by anyone. Expressed in Seconds since Epoch (similar to %TIMES)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%gd_name() File Name Name of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%gd_size() File Size Size of the file (in bytes) on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%gd_uploaded() Uploaded true if file was uploaded, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%gd_weburl() Web URL URL that can be used to show the file on your Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7></StringArray>
